title: Add CODEOWNERS file
body:
Fixes #9513

### Context
Creation of CODEOWNERS file as per request in issue. Having a code owners file would also be generally useful when opening PRs in this repo, as it can sometimes be difficult and time consuming to determine who should be included as a reviewer.

### Changes Made
Added @dotnet/source-build-internal as code owners for SB files
Added @dotnet/kitten as code owner for some of files and folders.

### Testing
No testing

nodes.body: Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.

To resolve

```
Unknown owner on line 4: make sure the team @dotnet/source-build-internal exists, is publicly visible, and has write access to the repository
/eng/SourceBuild*       @dotnet/source-build-internal
```

I added @dotnet/source-build-internal as repo writers. Please don't abuse the privilege :)
